mapper.insert: INSERT INTO amazoneuapplication( id, shopUrl, shopId, shopName, mainCommodity, companyName, chairManName, majorShareHolder1, shareHolderRate1, shareHolderBirthday1, shareHolderAddress1, majorShareHolder2, shareHolderRate2, shareHolderBirthday2, shareHolderAddress2, majorShareHolder3, shareHolderRate3, shareHolderBirthday3, shareHolderAddress3, majorShareHolder4, shareHolderRate4, shareHolderBirthday4, shareHolderAddress4, czbankBranch, czbankAcc, customerName, mail, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, uploadTime, status, applicationFileName ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{shopUrl}, #{shopId}, #{shopName}, #{mainCommodity}, #{companyName}, #{chairManName}, #{majorShareHolder1}, #{shareHolderRate1}, #{shareHolderBirthday1}, #{shareHolderAddress1}, #{majorShareHolder2}, #{shareHolderRate2}, #{shareHolderBirthday2}, #{shareHolderAddress2}, #{majorShareHolder3}, #{shareHolderRate3}, #{shareHolderBirthday3}, #{shareHolderAddress3}, #{majorShareHolder4}, #{shareHolderRate4}, #{shareHolderBirthday4}, #{shareHolderAddress4}, #{czbankBranch}, #{czbankAcc}, #{customerName}, #{mail}, #{managerName}, #{managerDepartment}, #{managerId}, NOW(), 0, #{applicationFileName} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, shopUrl, shopId, shopName, mainCommodity, companyName, chairManName, majorShareHolder1, shareHolderRate1, shareHolderBirthday1, shareHolderAddress1, majorShareHolder2, shareHolderRate2, shareHolderBirthday2, shareHolderAddress2, majorShareHolder3, shareHolderRate3, shareHolderBirthday3, shareHolderAddress3, majorShareHolder4, shareHolderRate4, shareHolderBirthday4, shareHolderAddress4, czbankBranch, czbankAcc, customerName, mail, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, uploadTime, status, auditor, applicationFileName FROM amazoneuapplication WHERE status = #{status} AND auditor = #{auditor}

SELECT id, shopUrl, shopId, shopName, mainCommodity, companyName, chairManName, majorShareHolder1, shareHolderRate1, shareHolderBirthday1, shareHolderAddress1, majorShareHolder2, shareHolderRate2, shareHolderBirthday2, shareHolderAddress2, majorShareHolder3, shareHolderRate3, shareHolderBirthday3, shareHolderAddress3, majorShareHolder4, shareHolderRate4, shareHolderBirthday4, shareHolderAddress4, czbankBranch, czbankAcc, customerName, mail, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, uploadTime, status, auditor, applicationFileName FROM amazoneuapplication WHERE status = 0 ORDER BY uploadTime LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update: UPDATE amazoneuapplication SET shopUrl = #{shopUrl}, shopId = #{shopId}, shopName = #{shopName}, mainCommodity = #{mainCommodity}, companyName = #{companyName}, chairManName = #{chairManName}, majorShareHolder1 = #{majorShareHolder1}, shareHolderRate1 = #{shareHolderRate1}, shareHolderBirthday1 = #{shareHolderBirthday1}, shareHolderAddress1 = #{shareHolderAddress1}, majorShareHolder2 = #{majorShareHolder2}, shareHolderRate2 = #{shareHolderRate2}, shareHolderBirthday2 = #{shareHolderBirthday2}, shareHolderAddress2 = #{shareHolderAddress2}, majorShareHolder3 = #{majorShareHolder3}, shareHolderRate3 = #{shareHolderRate3}, shareHolderBirthday3 = #{shareHolderBirthday3}, shareHolderAddress3 = #{shareHolderAddress3}, majorShareHolder4 = #{majorShareHolder4}, shareHolderRate4 = #{shareHolderRate4}, shareHolderBirthday4 = #{shareHolderBirthday4}, shareHolderAddress4 = #{shareHolderAddress4}, czbankBranch = #{czbankBranch}, czbankAcc = #{czbankAcc}, customerName = #{customerName}, mail = #{mail}, managerName = #{managerName}, managerDepartment = #{managerDepartment}, managerId = #{managerId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, shopUrl, shopId, shopName, mainCommodity, companyName, chairManName, majorShareHolder1, shareHolderRate1, shareHolderBirthday1, shareHolderAddress1, majorShareHolder2, shareHolderRate2, shareHolderBirthday2, shareHolderAddress2, majorShareHolder3, shareHolderRate3, shareHolderBirthday3, shareHolderAddress3, majorShareHolder4, shareHolderRate4, shareHolderBirthday4, shareHolderAddress4, czbankBranch, czbankAcc, customerName, mail, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, uploadTime, auditor, applicationFileName FROM amazoneuapplication ORDER BY uploadTime LIMIT #{begin}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM amazoneuapplication WHERE status >= 0

SELECT id, shopUrl, shopId, shopName, mainCommodity, companyName, chairManName, majorShareHolder1, shareHolderRate1, shareHolderBirthday1, shareHolderAddress1, majorShareHolder2, shareHolderRate2, shareHolderBirthday2, shareHolderAddress2, majorShareHolder3, shareHolderRate3, shareHolderBirthday3, shareHolderAddress3, majorShareHolder4, shareHolderRate4, shareHolderBirthday4, shareHolderAddress4, czbankBranch, czbankAcc, customerName, mail, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, uploadTime, auditor, applicationFileName FROM amazoneuapplication WHERE shopName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR companyName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR chairManName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR majorShareHolder1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR majorShareHolder2 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR majorShareHolder3 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR majorShareHolder4 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR customerName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR managerName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') ORDER BY uploadTime

SELECT id, shopUrl, shopId, shopName, mainCommodity, companyName, chairManName, majorShareHolder1, shareHolderRate1, shareHolderBirthday1, shareHolderAddress1, majorShareHolder2, shareHolderRate2, shareHolderBirthday2, shareHolderAddress2, majorShareHolder3, shareHolderRate3, shareHolderBirthday3, shareHolderAddress3, majorShareHolder4, shareHolderRate4, shareHolderBirthday4, shareHolderAddress4, czbankBranch, czbankAcc, customerName, mail, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, uploadTime, auditor, applicationFileName FROM amazoneuapplication WHERE id = #{uuid}
